column4: does firefox seriously say "beta 5" when you have it open on 8.04?
okay, that's all. Just wanted to verify the insanity o_o

is there a canonical channel? I'm awful confused as to why they've included beta5 (even labelled so, advertising beta-quality program) in their long-term ubuntu release, and yet fail to support any kubuntu as long-term.
i don't believe canonical has ever supported kubuntu, they only care about ubuntu
